Transponder Use on the Ground <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2019/Jan2019/SAFOJan19]]> SAFO 15006 and What it Means for Ground Operations
The primary reason for this SAFO is to ensure that transponder settings allow aircraft to be tracked on the ground at airports equipped with Runway Safety Systems...
